item.title: Correlating microbial community profiles with geochemical data in highly stratified sediments from the Arctic Mid-Ocean Ridge
item.description: We show a significant statistical relationship between variation in geochemical composition and prokaryotic community structure within deep-sea sediments near the hydrothermal vent field Lokiâ€™s Castle at the Arctic Mid-Ocean Ridge, in the Norwegian-Greenland Sea.
